Group Members

Staff

Ma (马), Jie (杰)

I am a professor at the School of Mathematical Sciences, University of Science and Technology of China (USTC).
I am an associate editor at SIAM Journal on Discrete Mathematics since 2018. I received The National Science Fund for Excellent Young Scholars (国家自然科学基金委优秀青年基金) in 2016 and The National Science Fund for Distinguished Young Scholars (国家自然科学基金委杰出青年基金) in 2021.
email: jiema@ustc.edu.cn

  • Professor, School of Mathematical Sciences, University of Science and Technology of China
  • Postdoctoral Associate, Department of Mathematical Sciences, Carnegie Mellon University
  • Hedrick Assistant Professor, Department of Mathematics, UCLA
  • Ph.D. in Mathematics, Thesis Advisor:Prof. Xingxing Yu, School of Mathematics, Georgia Institute of Technology
  • B.Sc. in Mathematics, Department of Mathematics, University of Science and Technology of China
